thread.title: Firstrade A Sponsor of the October 18th Making Strides Against Breast Cancer Walk at Central Park

author: cbs8
title: Firstrade A Sponsor of the October 18th Making Strides Against Breast Cancer Walk at Central Park
text:
Firstrade Securities Inc.
As one of the event sponsors, Firstrade will have a booth set up in Central Park as well as a number of donation events and free giveaways.
NEW YORK , Oct. 13, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Firstrade has signed on as a sponsor of the American Cancer Society's Making Strides Against Breast Cancer walk on October 18 th . As part of their sponsorship, Firstrade will have a booth set up in Central Park.
Visitors to the booth will receive a free selfie stick. Making Strides NYC walkers can also enter to win a Fitbit Flex Tracker by posting the reason they walked along with a picture or video of themselves at the walk to Firstrade's Making Strides Walk Facebook page.
When asked about the event, Firstrade CEO John Liu said, "At Firstrade, we believe that a company's true culture is demonstrated by the way it reaches out to those in need. We are honored to be participating in this event to help fight against breast cancer. We hope everyone will become more aware of this disease while at the same time have fun on this day!"
Roughly 12 percent of women will develop breast cancer. The American Cancer Society's Making Strides Against Breast Cancer walks comprise the nation's largest network of breast cancer awareness events with almost 300 communities taking part. The donations raised during the event go toward cancer research efforts, developing preventative care literature, and the creation of support programs to those who need it.
In honor of Breast Cancer Awareness month, Firstrade will also be donating $5 to the American Cancer Society for every new account opened in October using the verification code MAKINGSTRIDES.
About Firstrade Securities
Firstrade is a leading online brokerage offering a full line of investment products and tools to help investors take control of their financial future. Since its founding in 1985, Firstrade has been committed in providing high value and quality services to our customers. Combining proprietary trading technology, a highly intuitive user interface, outstanding customer service, and mobility applications, Firstrade is a comprehensive solution for all of your investing needs. Whether you are a new investor or active trader, at Firstrade, we are committed to excellence, and putting the investor first. For more information, visit www.firstrade.com . Member FINRA/SIPC.
